body.name: JOY & LOTUS Lightweight Self Folding Baby Stroller, Ultra-Compact with One Hand Gravity Fold, Airplane Ready Travel Stroller, Near Flat Recline Seat with UV and Waterproof Canopy, gray
features: ULTRA SAFE LIGHTWEIGHT STROLLER -- Travel freely and go anywhere with your little one safely secured in their compact stroller. The padded 5-point safety harness gives babies and toddlers a comfy ride on steep roads with a one-touch linked brake system for quick response.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY & GOOD FOR EVERYDAY -- Push this toddler stroller easily through airports and crowds, then fold and collect it single-handedly to store in the luggage rack of an airplane, train, or trunk of the car. Great for daily walks and running errands.

EASY ONE PRESS AUTO FOLD -- With just one hand and a single press, this lightweight baby stroller will auto-fold and auto-stand like magic under its own self gravity, enabling parents to quickly fold and easily carry it, even while holding a baby in their arms.

ADJUSTABLE SUN CANOPY & MOSQUITO NET -- This small stroller for toddlers 1-5 has a large adjustable and detachable canopy with shady mesh windows and an optional UV-proof mosquito net. 360° front swivel wheels enable a perfect turning circle and effortless maneuverability.

MORE STORAGE MEANS NO MORE BAGS -- An extra-large storage basket under the seat is perfect for loading various baby essentials... with so much storage space, parents don't need to bring an extra backpack or diaper bag while making a quick stop or shopping run.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Imagine a life spent traveling the world freely, your baby safely secured and comfortable in their lightweight stroller… An auto-folding, ultra-compact stroller that knows no limitations and makes no compromises when it comes to safety and comfort… A reliable toddler transportation tool that parents can trust and use every day for those magical first 1-4 years of life!

Benefits and Features One Press Auto FoldHidden Telescoping Pulling RodCompact and LightweightHigh Clearance SeatMulti-Position Backrest3 Position FootrestDual Seat CoversPerforated Leather HandleLeather Wrist StrapDetachable Leather ArmrestZippered UV-Proof Mosquito Net
Suspension Wheels for Smooth RideOne-Touch Linked Brake SystemAdjustable Detachable Sun Canopy5-Point Safety HarnessExtra-Large Storage Basket and PocketWeight: 15.2 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roll and Nap
reviews.reviewText: When I'm taking care of the grandbaby, I like to have my things rather than rely on her mother to leave them. I wanted a stroller for my granddaughter, but I'm on a tight budget and don't have a big car. This one is ideal for what I need.It is a small stroller that is simple to assemble, fold, and store, and easily fits into my car. It's not a name brand, but it works well, is simple to use, secure, and reasonably priced. It keeps the infant safe and secure while rolling smoothly. I can easily take her with me when running errands, and she is much more comfortable in a stroller than in my arms or a buggy, so she can nap if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is light weight but extremely defective. First time I purchased the back zipper broke so baby could not sit up. This happened within a few days of purchase. I thought it was a bad zipper. Retuned abd ordered a new one. I’ve had it about a month and the front bar broke. I’ve reached out as to where I can buy a replacement with no response

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Super nice and easy folding, great quality but the sitting area has an inclination that is way back and doesn’t have an option to adjust to the needs of the baby/toddler. That’s the only thing that I would change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed a travel stroller that wouldn’t break the bank as we only need it a couple times. This is a nice stroller however we have had multiple issues with it. The foot rest does not stay up for my son at all. The back rest is also kind of hard to adjust if baby is inside the stroller. My son is about 30 inches and about 20 lbs and this stroller has randomly collapsed three times with him in it. No injuries or anything thankfully but did scare him and us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of bang for the buck on this one
reviews.reviewText: The price, and low amount of reviews might fool you but this is the real deal. very light weight, easy fold unfold, and has a nice little drag handle to drag it like a luggage on if need be. Easy set up, just pop on 2 wheels and snap in the arm rest, NO TOOLS NEED!!! The the price might be shocking but its well made and just as good if not better than most 150 too 200 dollar stroller. If it ever comes back in stock buy it!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it because it's light and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my granddaughter and I like it because it's easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WARNING! THIS PRODUCT SHOULD BE RECALLED
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this stroller for our baby because we were traveling to Disney with them. First day it went without any problems but we barely used it. However by the second day when we were pushing the stroller and lifted the two front wheels off the ground to go over a sidewalk, the stroller completely collapsed and our baby fell backwards inside the stroller. Being the only stroller we had, we had to use it for 4 more days and every single day we had the dame thing happen to us. The last one was at the airport and that time because the stroller was not being held by the rear handle it completely collapsed, bending our kid in half and resulting on him hitting the rear of his head against the floor. If I could give negative stars I would.THIS STROLLER IS A DEATHTRAP!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Is cute but not really useful
reviews.reviewText: It’s easier to fold and is light weight and compact but it doesn’t offer support at all for the back of your child, my son was sliding very bad from the stroller.
